Today yea...fun-ish.. stupid lessons for most of day.. in biology i was asked if i had eaten the maggots, which we used in our experiment last week........."no comment" In music....we got to hear dinny's impersonation of Elvis, signing hound-dog song.. our music teacher killed himself.... anyway.....then came lunch...had it....and then went out side and pissd abt with sum people on the phone..and then near the bushes.. we were 4 there. me/dinny/roman/temple...roman kept trying to get temple into the bushes....and he succeded. then temple lost his phone and roman took it and he kept on passing it onto me and dinny...and then betwenn us 3 again..while temple looked as blank as ever, trying to look for his phone..he got pretty annoyed though..when dinny chucked it straight into the bushes....temple seeing this..orders dinny to go fetch it..however. temple goes in2 find it first. and comes out saying he cant see it...he tells dinny to FIND it!!however...unknown to dinny temple actually did find it and had it....while dinny was looking for it.....dinny ended up being the bushes for about 10minutes. trying to find temples phone which temple already had. anyway..afterwards me and dinny and also temple went to piss about near the water sprinklers! much fun!!! me and dinny got drenched for next lesson! end skl.. after skl me dinny go out again to much around with the water sprinklers again. i completely ruin my clothes, pretty much the same with dinny. got here ...soaking still! and sliped on the stairs. hurt my head AGAIN! o rite..didnt say about the head. last lesson i go into the lesson..open door slightly..and lehmann on the other side comes bashing into the door at full speed and gets the door to whack me in the side of the head. ... recoverd ....anyway....where was i? no wait thats it.. yea kl cya

Yo! Arrived at school...just... nearly missed hammersmith stop...and this fat dude blocked the exit when i noticed it was my stop.. got on bus...got to school. ehh... Had Double dt.. f***** about for most of it ehhh stupid lessons afterwards....had french assisnt for french lesson..tried to piss her off..didnt work... lunch!:- had it..then went outside with sum people and made some prank phone calls..eg) phoned up 118888 and asked for the number for 118888... also..two people...(whose names i cant mention)---alex temple and sam stanley...started pushing each other into the bushes...they came out of the bushes and sam(holding a tennis racket) whacks temple right in the gob with it (by accident)...sam gets the rebound of the hit and gets wacked also in the gob by the racket. temple screams and his mouth ends up flooded with blood. and sam holds his mouth for about 10 mins thinking he's chipped or possibly lost a tooth. I point out that his tooth is somewhere on the floor behind him!!! me and sum other ppl burst out laughing at temple on the floor in agony and sam laughing at temple... anyway....after lunch had to do games...didnt do that much for tennis and managed to wind up the fencing teacher afterwards! ehh...then after skl i got bored...and left... on the tube station..bloody f****** pigeon tried to push me onto the tracks! it failed, obviously, and i managed to tie its wings together with an elastic band...i then threw it onto the tracks..and got on my heathrow train.. home now....waiting for sum people to get online and send them files...stuff.. a bit bored.. yea thats it so far. enjoy

Thank god! After about 10 days of begging for an invite to set up a Gmail account! I've finally got one. Its still in its beta however GMail is amazing! It looks nice...no ads..tons of space! And i think i might use it now for my Msn Messenger email address as well as my email! I dont normally do email stuff but this Gmail looks too good to miss out on. In case you're confused, let me explain. Firstly. Google have set up there own Email thing. Its gonna be as good as Google itself. The email calld: Gmail has not been released to the public yet. However a share of lucky people have been used to test it out and have got their own accounts on Gmail. They also could send invitations to other people to test out Gmail! One of which a kinda person sent to me for me to set up a Gmail account. Tons of people are all rushing to get an invite so they can secure a good name @gmail.com...instead of like: this_is_my_email@gmail.com or something like that. Anyway, i managed to get: Sumster@gmail.com. ...If you want to find out more about this "Gmail" please go to: urlLink GMAIL and if you become as desperate as I was to get one please go to urlLink Gmail Swap Where you can post your pleas for what you would swap for a GMAIL invite... Thanks, Sumo

Yea......that stung for a while "I'm an idiot" Apart from that didnt do much else... o wait..did some prank calling though.. annoyed the hell out of this french waiter.. swore at him in french....and stuff i got bored of that after 10 mins on the phone with the same waiter...(may have been my accent..who knows)... ehhh now im doing this.........yea thats it..

Where should I start? Ok...It was all going soo damn well. Great cross from Beckham and wonderful finish by Lampard. Nice football there... Ok. Second Half: France start puting pressure on us...ok...we can just about cope... 90th minute and stoppage time...Everything going fine.. Until Heskey goes and lets some anger out on a frenchie..I dont blame him myself..but it lands the french with a free kick. F****** amazing shot..David James... GOAL!!....ok shit! Then 2 minutes later... gerrard messes up some well needed defence.. urlLink and lands his keeper with a 1 on 1 with...guess who.....Henry...David James with hardly any choice runs out and trips up Henry. PENALTY! Zidane steps up again and shoots...and scores! 2-1 to france...and after about 2 seconds there goes the fina whistle... AH! Soo damn annoying! I cant be arsed to think about it any more.. O well....f*** it... Screw the english and the french.... Yea...
